import React, { Component } from 'react' import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import '../css/ShopsSearch.css'; import shoplogo from "../images/shop-logo.png"; class ShopsSearch extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { shop_list: [], isKouzines: false, isFilterMenu: false, fields: {"all":true,"souvlakia":false,"kafedes":false,"pizza":false,"burgers":false,"krepes":false,"apostasi":false,"xronos-paradosis":false,"elaxisti":false,"alfabitika":true} }; } kouzinesToggle = () => { this.setState({ isKouzines: !this.state.isKouzines }); }; filterToggle = () => { this.setState({ isFilterMenu: !this.state.isFilterMenu }); }; handleChange(field, e){ let fields = this.state.fields; if(fields[field]){ fields[field]=false }else{ fields[field]=true } this.setState({fields}); } componentDidMount() { fetch("https://localhost:5001/shop").then(res => res.json()).then(res => this.setState({shop_list: res})) } getShops() { let shop_list = this.state.shop_list; return shop_list.map((shop) => { let categories = shop["categories"].map(s => s["name"]) return (

{shop["name"]}

{shop["address"]} {shop["distance"]}χλμ
Χρόνος
{shop["deliveryTime"]}'
Ελάχιστη
{shop["minOrder"]}€
{categories.join(", ")}
Παράγγειλε
) }) } render() { return (
κουζινες
Ταξινόμηση
{this.getShops()}

Πίτσα Μπύρα

Θέρμη 1,9χλμ
Χρόνος
35'
Ελάχιστη
4€
Pizza, Γλυκά, Ποτά
Παράγγειλε
); } } export default ShopsSearch;
